EnExplanation: A conjunction used to connect words or phrases, similar to 'and' in English.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma olen näljane ning tahan süüa.
Samples.EnSentence: I am hungry and want to eat.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma lähen poodi ning ostan leiba.
Samples.EnSentence: I am going to the store and buying bread.
